Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Melimine (a hybrid peptide of melittin and protamine, synthetic)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: This peptide, consisting of the C-terminal regions of melittin and protamine, has been covalently immobilized 2008 via the N-terminus. Melimine coated contact lens reduced bacterial colonization (S. aureus and P. aeruginosa) by~70%.

Literature.Title: A novel cationic-peptide coating for the prevention of microbial colonization on contact lenses.
Literature.Author: Willcox MD, Hume EB, Aliwarga Y, Kumar N, Cole N.
